successes.title: Storium — The Online Storytelling Game
successes.description: Storium is a new kind of online game where you and your friends tell any story you can imagine, together.

Pledges.description: BETA PLAYER: Instant access to the Storium beta playtest. You can start playing right now and invite friends to join you! (See “Beta Player” at left for instructions on how to claim your access.)
MEMBER: Everything in BETA PLAYER, plus one year of Storium, starting as of our public launch.
THE DEAL: Everything in MEMBER, plus you also get every world that we fund through this Kickstarter, including all stretch goal worlds. The more we raise, the more worlds you get.

PIONEER: Everything in THE DEAL, plus you get a special badge on your Storium profile showing everyone that you are one of our founding supporters. We will also inscribe your name forever on a special “thank you” page at Storium.com. Thanks for helping us make Storium!
TEAM PLAYER: Everything in PIONEER, plus up to 3 of your friends or family get access to Storium that is equivalent to the MEMBER reward.

MASTER CLASS: Everything in TEAM PLAYER, plus you and up to 3 of your friends or family get to attend a special Google Hangout where Storium’s creators share lessons, advice, techniques for getting the most out of playing Storium.

TEAM LEADER: Everything in PIONEER, plus up to 3 of your friends or family get access to Storium that is equivalent to the PIONEER award. This means you *all* get every world that is funded by this Kickstarter!

CREATOR: Everything in MASTER CLASS, plus you get to work with one of our world designers to create a new Storium world of your own, available to the entire Storium community, with credit given to you.
COUNCILOR: Everything in MASTER CLASS, plus you get a spot on the Storium Backer Council, a group of backers whom we consult about new features early in the design process.

Everything in MASTER CLASS, plus you get to spend the day with Storium’s founding team in the San Francisco Bay area. We’ll have a candid conversation about our plans for Storium's future, listen to your feedback, and take you out for a fun lunch or dinner. You must arrange your own travel and lodging.

Everything in MASTER CLASS, plus you get to spend the day with Storium’s founding team in the San Francisco Bay area. We’ll have a candid conversation about our plans for Storium's future, listen to your feedback, and take you out for a fun lunch or dinner. You must arrange your own travel and lodging.
